page.title: 16ABINGDON'S LOCAL NEWS(2)
page.content: (CONTINUED FROM PAGE 15) Leslie Argyle was re-elected Mayor of Ock Sreet in the annual ceremony to to find the leader of the Abingdon Morris Men. ATTACK ON PANDA CAR A bomb scare in an Abingdon night club sparked off a wave of violence when a Police car was sent to investigate. A teenager spotted the police car in a nearby car park and immediately started banging on the car roof.Then he tried to break off the blue flashing light on top of the car,but when he failed ,he bent the aerial,before running off.Abingdon magistrates were told that three hundred and twenty one pounds worth of damage had been done to the vehicle. Written by Robert Turnbull and Matthew Spraggs aged 11 years.
